snippet.title: MOTORSLICE - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
In the ruins of a megastructure, a girl arrives with a single objective: Destroy every machine inside.

Inspired by the Prince of Persia series, traverse liminal brutalist landscapes and fight massive heavy machines in this slice of life action-adventure game.

2025

-
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2830030/MOTORSLICE
Twitter: https://x.com/RegularStudio_
Website: https://regularstudiogames.com/
-
